gold: By far the most common method to access the ride-sharing platform Uber in the United States is via smartphone ; around 17.7 million U.S. adults had accessed Uber via smartphone as of April 2017 – significantly higher than the next most popular platform , desktop computers , with 6.8 million users.
The U.S. ride sharing market Uber is the largest ride-sharing platform in the United States , accounting for just under 70 percent of the total market as of October 2018.
However Lyft , the next-largest ride sharing platform in the U.S. , has seen significant growth in ridership over the last five years , narrowing the gap between it and Uber .
